https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/g22CSS6rsR3nD0hGuYIYjQva5FH.jpg Somewhat crazy semi-documentary by director Joe D'Amato is a strange series of Burlesque performances from around the globe. Actress and dancer Amanda Lear hosts these mostly musical numbers designed to get people on stage. Crazy Nights
